Power Issues.step: Ensure the main power switch is turned ON.
Check if the emergency stop button is released.
Verify the power cable is properly connected.

No Display on Screen.step: Confirm the monitor is powered ON.
Check HDMI or VGA cable connections.

System Stuck at Logo.step: Restart the system and press F8 to enter Safe Mode.
Contact IT support if the issue persists.

Fixture Problems.step: Check fixture alignment with the test head.
Inspect pins for any damage or wear.
